name: Trexo Robotics
long_description: Trexo Robotics is building exoskeletons to help people walk, starting with children. Our product allows children with disabilities like Cerebral Palsy, to walk, in many cases for the first time in their lives. Trexo was started when Manmeet found that his nephew was born with Cerebral Palsy and would never be able to walk. Trexo is selling commercially, with a vision is to replace the wheelchair, for children, adults, and the elderly.
one_liner: Exoskeletons to help people walk, starting with children
